title: Steamtown National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         The Eastern National Bookstore at Steamtown NHS offers prompt, friendly service and advice to help select that "just right" gift. NPS Photo  The Museum Shop and Bookstore at Steamtown NHS is operated by Eastern National, Inc. Eastern National supports the ongoing preservation and interpretation efforts at the Park. For more information or to place an order, phone (570) 340-5213 or click here.       Eastern National's bookstore at Steamtown NHS offers a great variety of memorabilia to help remember your visit.  Light snacks and cold soft drinks are also available at the Bookstore.(Please note that food, snacks or beverages are not permitted inside the Visitor Center or any park building, museum or theater and are allowed only aboard out-of-park excursion trains. Thank you.) NPS Photo
